segments.text: I'm not ready to go to sleep . I'm not tired .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's quite late , and you have an early day tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not going to be able to fall asleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why don't you try counting sheep ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've tried that before . It really doesn't work .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's beside the point , you still need to go to bed .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why can't I just stay up until I fall asleep ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If I let you do that , then you're just going to be up all night .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I promise I'll go to sleep soon .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , you're going to sleep now , so good night .
segments.speaker: S1
